subject: Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: John Brady was hired as coach of Arkansas State less than six weeks after being fired by Louisiana State. He inherits a team that finished 10-20 this season and has not been to the N.C.A.A. tournament since 1999. Brady went 192-139 in 11 seasons at L.S.U., including a Final Four appearance in 2006.
